FoxRabbit
Class Animal

java.lang.Object
  FoxRabbit.Animal
Direct Known Subclasses:
Fox, Rabbit
abstract class Animal
extends java.lang.Object

Grouping superclass that is used to combine common and related behavior and attributes need by the Fox and rabbit classes. Can also be subclassed to provide new animal and its behavior to logically expand the game.

Since:
JDK 1.6
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mostafa Mahmod Mahmod Eweda
See Also:
Animal, Rabbit

          The board the animal is moving on

          The location of the animal on board

          The observer the animal should notify when an event occurs to it
